1010111011001101 1010000111001101 0 -> sum: 0101000010011010, cout: 1

0101010000110010 1001001000001000 1 -> sum: 1110011000111011, cout: 0

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
